hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner in logistics services across Saudi Arabia

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: We believe that reliable and efficient logistics services are the key driver of business success. That's why we are committed to providing safe and on-time delivery services, powered by the latest real-time tracking technology to ensure your shipments reach from store to end customer with professionalism that exceeds expectations.
story.paragraph2: Since our launch, we have successfully built an extensive network covering more than 50 cities across the Kingdom, with a steadfast commitment to delivering high-quality services and exceptional customer experience. We continuously invest in technology and infrastructure to ensure the best possible service.
story.paragraph3: Today, we are proud to serve over 1,000 clients and successfully deliver more than 500,000 shipments, with an on-time delivery rate of 93%+. We are committed to continued growth and innovation to be the first choice for logistics services in the Kingdom.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide exceptional logistics services that contribute to our clients' success through reliability, speed, and innovation, while maintaining the highest standards of quality and safety.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the first and most reliable logistics partner in Saudi Arabia, and contribute to the development of the e-commerce and logistics sector in the region.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles we believe in and that guide our daily work

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We keep our promises and ensure your shipments are delivered on time with the highest standards of safety and quality.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We always strive to provide the best possible service through continuous improvement and attention to the finest details.

customer.title: Customer First
customer.description: Our customers' satisfaction is our top priority, and we work hard to exceed their expectations every time.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We invest in the latest technologies and innovative solutions to improve our services and customer experience.

professionalTeam.title: Professional Uniformed Delivery Team
professionalTeam.description: Trained drivers representing your brand professionally

benefits: Comprehensive coverage of all major cities in Saudi Arabia
93% successful delivery rate
Automatic customer notifications via SMS and email
Multiple delivery attempts with proactive communication
Easy rescheduling options for customers
Delivery confirmation with digital signature

faq.a1: Last mile delivery is the final stage of the delivery process where the shipment is transported from the distribution center to the end customer's doorstep. We ensure fast and reliable delivery with real-time tracking.
faq.a2: Yes, we offer same-day and next-day delivery in major cities. The service depends on pickup and delivery location and order time.
faq.q3: How can I track my shipment?
faq.a3: We provide real-time GPS tracking for all shipments. You can track your shipment through our website or mobile app, and you'll receive automatic notifications via SMS and email.
faq.q4: What happens if the customer is not available during delivery?
faq.a4: We make multiple delivery attempts with proactive customer communication. We also provide easy rescheduling options for customers to choose a convenient delivery time.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Solutions
ecommerce.description: Full cash on delivery collection, returns management, and e-commerce integration to streamline your online store operations.
ecommerce.whyChooseDesc: Our e-commerce solutions are specifically designed to meet the unique needs of online stores in Saudi Arabia.
ecommerce.ctaTitle: Ready to streamline your e-commerce operations?
ecommerce.ctaDesc: Get a customized quote for e-commerce solutions designed specifically for your online store.

cod.title: Cash on Delivery Collection Service
cod.description: Secure cash collection with fast fund transfer and comprehensive financial reports

returns.title: Automatic Returns and Exchanges Processing
returns.description: Streamlined returns management system with quality inspection and refurbishment coordination

api.title: API Integration with Major Platforms
api.description: Seamless connection with Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, and more

analytics.title: Detailed Analytics and Reports
analytics.description: Real-time insights on delivery performance and financial metrics

benefits: Secure COD processing with transfer within 48 hours
Comprehensive reverse logistics for returns management
API integration with major e-commerce platforms
Detailed financial reports and payment tracking
Quality inspection for returns and inventory management
Dedicated support for e-commerce partners

faq.q1: How does the cash on delivery service work?
faq.a1: We collect the cash amount from the customer upon delivery, then transfer the funds to your account within 48 business hours with comprehensive financial reports.
faq.q2: Can I integrate with my e-commerce platform?
faq.a2: Yes, we provide API integration with all major e-commerce platforms like Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, and Zid. Integration is easy and straightforward with complete documentation.
faq.a3: We have a comprehensive reverse logistics system that includes picking up returns from customers, quality inspection, refurbishment coordination, and inventory management. We make the returns process smooth and easy.
faq.q4: What are the COD service fees?
faq.a4: Service fees depend on your business volume and specific requirements. We offer competitive pricing with discounts for large volumes. Request a customized quote for pricing details.

customized.title: Customized Delivery
customized.description: Logistics solutions tailored specifically to your business needs, from storage to specialized handling requirements.
customized.whyChooseDesc: We understand that every business has unique needs. Our customized solutions are designed to meet your specific requirements.
customized.ctaTitle: Ready for a logistics solution designed specifically for your business?
customized.ctaDesc: Let's discuss your specific needs and design the perfect solution for your business.

fragile.title: Fragile and Valuable Items Handling
fragile.description: Special care and security protocols for valuable shipments

bulk.title: Bulk and B2B Delivery Solutions
bulk.description: Logistics services designed for large commercial shipments

account.title: Dedicated Account Management
account.description: Personal account manager and priority support

benefits: Customized solutions designed for your specific industry requirements
Specialized equipment for handling and transportation
Dedicated account managers and priority support
Flexible storage options and inventory management
Customized pricing based on your needs
Customized Service Level Agreements (SLA)

faq.q1: What types of customized solutions do you offer?
faq.a1: We offer a wide range of customized solutions including temperature-controlled delivery, fragile items handling, B2B solutions, customized storage, and any logistics requirements specific to your industry.
faq.q2: How is pricing determined for customized solutions?
faq.a2: Pricing depends on your specific requirements, operations volume, and required services. We provide customized quotes after understanding your needs in detail.
faq.q3: Can I get a dedicated account manager?
faq.a3: Yes, all customized solutions customers get a personal account manager, priority support, and regular business reviews to ensure your needs are met.
faq.a4: Yes, we provide flexible storage options with advanced inventory management, including temperature-controlled storage for sensitive products.

fulfillment.title: Fulfillment Services
fulfillment.description: Experience end-to-end fulfillment with our integrated storage and precision order management solutions. We handle the entire logistical journey from our dedicated warehouses, ensuring seamless, high-quality delivery to your customers.
fulfillment.whyChooseDesc: Our comprehensive fulfillment solution combines warehousing, inventory management, and shipping into one seamless service designed for e-commerce success.
fulfillment.ctaTitle: Ready to streamline your fulfillment operations?
fulfillment.ctaDesc: Let us handle your storage, packaging, and shipping while you focus on growing your business.

storage.title: Integrated Storage Solutions
storage.description: Host your inventory in our equipped warehouses within Riyadh city. We provide secure and flexible storage spaces that meet your business needs, ensuring the preservation of your goods' safety as our top priority.

inventory.title: Operations and Order Management
inventory.description: We handle order management and preparation professionally directly from our warehouses. Thanks to the high flexibility in our systems, we ensure quick adjustment of our capabilities to match your shipment volume and customer expectations.

packaging.title: Shipping and Final Delivery
packaging.description: We guarantee the arrival of your goods from our warehouses to your customer's door anywhere in the Kingdom with accuracy and efficiency. We provide various delivery options including same-day or next-day delivery with live tracking and complete insurance through OTP system.

shipping.title: Dedicated Account Manager for Your Business
shipping.description: We provide you with a dedicated account manager specifically for your business to help you achieve your commercial goals.

reports.title: Monthly Reports
reports.description: We provide detailed monthly reports aimed at ensuring efficiency and professionalism.

support.title: Professional Customer Service
support.description: We strive to provide professional and innovative customer services, caring about meeting your needs and providing a unique experience.

benefits: End-to-end fulfillment from storage to delivery
Reduce operational costs with shared warehousing
Scale your business without infrastructure investment
Real-time inventory visibility and reporting
Seamless integration with e-commerce platforms
Professional handling and quality control

faq.q1: Does TD provide storage space for my products, or is the service limited to delivery?
faq.a1: Yes, TD provides integrated logistical solutions that include hosting your goods in our dedicated warehouses. We handle the entire storage process, allowing you to manage your inventory without the need for your own warehouse, while ensuring the highest safety standards to maintain the quality of your shipments.
faq.q2: How are my e-commerce store orders handled once they are stored in your warehouses?
faq.a2: Once your goods are stored, TD manages your orders with precision and professionalism. We handle the full fulfillment process, which includes picking, packing, and preparing the shipment as soon as an order is received, then shipping it directly to the end consumer to ensure a seamless shopping experience.
faq.q3: What is the geographical coverage for the delivery service after the shipment leaves the warehouse?
faq.a3: TD is committed to delivering your shipments to all regions within the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Regardless of your customers' geographical location, we guarantee precise and efficient delivery with various options, including same-day or next-day delivery.
faq.q4: How can I track my inventory levels and the status of shipments sent to my customers?
faq.a4: The company utilizes advanced technologies to track and monitor parcels, providing a Live Tracking system that gives you full visibility of the shipment's journey from the warehouse to the customer's door. Additionally, we provide detailed monthly reports to ensure operational efficiency and to help you monitor the performance of your sales and inventory professionally.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At TD Logistics, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when using our website and services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
items: Contact information: Name, email, phone number
Shipping information: Addresses, package details
Account information: Login credentials
Technical information: IP address, browser type, device used

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
items: Providing shipping and delivery services
Communicating with you about your shipments
Improving our services and user experience
Sending updates and offers (with your consent)
Complying with legal requirements

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We take strict security measures to protect your data, including:
items: Data encryption during transfer and storage
Advanced protection systems against hacking
Restricting data access to authorized employees only
Regular security reviews

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties. We may share your data with:
items: Delivery partners to complete shipping operations
Technical service providers
Government authorities upon legal request

rights.title: Your Rights
items: Access your personal data
Correct inaccurate data
Request deletion of your data
Object to processing of your data
Withdraw your consent at any time

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. You can control cookie settings through your browser.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For any inquiries about the privacy policy, please contact us via:

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to TD Logistics. By using our website and services, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.

definitions.title: Definitions
items: "Company" or "We": TD Logistics
"Customer" or "You": User of the website or services
"Services": All shipping, delivery, and storage services provided
"Shipment": Any package or goods shipped through our services

serviceTerms.title: Service Terms
serviceTerms.content: By accepting these terms, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate and correct information when using our services
Not ship prohibited or dangerous materials
Comply with local and international shipping regulations
Pay all due fees on time

prohibited.title: Prohibited Materials
prohibited.content: The following materials are prohibited from shipping:
items: Explosive and flammable materials
Narcotics and legally prohibited substances
Weapons and ammunition
Toxic and hazardous materials
Cash and precious jewelry (without special insurance)
Any materials violating local regulations

liability.title: Liability and Compensation
liability.content: We are committed to compensating the customer in case of loss or damage to the shipment according to the following conditions:
items: Any damage must be reported within 48 hours of receipt
Compensation is based on the declared shipment value or the maximum limit
We are not responsible for delays due to force majeure
Additional insurance is available for high-value shipments

payment.title: Payment and Pricing
items: Prices are subject to change without prior notice
Fees are calculated based on weight or volume (whichever is greater)
Additional fees may apply to remote areas
Payment is due upon order or as agreed

cancellation.title: Service Cancellation
cancellation.content: The customer has the right to cancel the shipment before it is picked up by the courier. After pickup, cancellation fees may apply.

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: In case of any dispute, it will be resolved amicably first. If that fails, the dispute will be referred to the competent judicial authorities in Saudi Arabia.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. You will be notified of any significant changes via email or the website.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any inquiries about the terms and conditions:

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to the most common questions about our logistics services

coverage.question: What areas do your services cover?
coverage.answer: We cover more than 50 cities across Saudi Arabia, including Riyadh, Jeddah, Dammam, Mecca, Medina, and all major cities and remote areas.

tracking.question: How can I track my shipment?
tracking.answer: You can track your shipment in real-time through our website using the tracking number. We also provide automatic notifications via SMS and email to keep you updated on your shipment status.

storage.question: Does TD provide storage space for my products, or is the service limited to delivery?
storage.answer: Yes, TD provides integrated logistical solutions that include hosting your goods in our dedicated warehouses. We handle the entire storage process, allowing you to manage your inventory without the need for your own warehouse, while ensuring the highest safety standards to maintain the quality of your shipments.

fulfillment.question: How are my e-commerce store orders handled once they are stored in your warehouses?
fulfillment.answer: Once your goods are stored, TD manages your orders with precision and professionalism. We handle the full fulfillment process, which includes picking, packing, and preparing the shipment as soon as an order is received, then shipping it directly to the end consumer to ensure a seamless shopping experience.

coverage_delivery.question: What is the geographical coverage for the delivery service after the shipment leaves the warehouse?
coverage_delivery.answer: TD is committed to delivering your shipments to all regions within the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Regardless of your customers' geographical location, we guarantee precise and efficient delivery with various options, including same-day or next-day delivery.

inventory_tracking.question: How can I track my inventory levels and the status of shipments sent to my customers?
inventory_tracking.answer: The company utilizes advanced technologies to track and monitor parcels, providing a Live Tracking system that gives you full visibility of the shipment's journey from the warehouse to the customer's door. Additionally, we provide detailed monthly reports to ensure operational efficiency and to help you monitor the performance of your sales and inventory professionally.
